dataElement.name: New OPD attendance greater than 5yrs Male
New OPD attendance greater than 5yrs Female
New OPD Attendance less than 5yrs Male
New OPD Attendance less than 5yrs Female
Revisit OPD attendance greater than 5yrs Male

Revisit OPD Attendance greater than 5yrs Female

dataValueTemplate.annotation: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'New Patient' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'M' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) > 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'Revisit' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'M' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) > 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'New Patient' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'F' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) > 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'Revisit' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'F' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) > 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'New Patient' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'M' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) < 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'Revisit' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'M' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) < 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'New Patient' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'F' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) < 5

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log INNER JOIN person p ON p.person_id=patient_id WHERE opd_concept_id=5113 AND visit_status LIKE 'Revisit' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod AND gender LIKE 'F' AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, p.birthdate, created_on) < 5
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log WHERE opd_concept_id=5114 AND visit_status LIKE 'New Patient' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_patient_queue_log WHERE opd_concept_id=5114 AND visit_status LIKE 'Revisit' AND DATE(created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=3 AND DATE(date_enrolled) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT patient_id, DATE(created_on) AS qa FROM ( SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM triage_patient_queue_log WHERE triage_concept_id=5123
UNION ALL
SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM opd_patient_queue_log WHERE opd_concept_id=5704 ) AS ql WHERE CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(ql.created_on)) NOT IN ( SELECT CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(date_enrolled))X FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=3 ) AND patient_id IN ( SELECT patient_id FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=3 AND (DATE(date_completed) IS NULL OR DATE(date_completed) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) ) GROUP BY patient_id, DATE(created_on) ) AS fqlog
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=1 AND DATE(date_enrolled) between :startOfPeriod and :endOfPeriod

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT patient_id, DATE(created_on) AS qa FROM ( SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM triage_patient_queue_log WHERE triage_concept_id=5123
UNION ALL
SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM opd_patient_queue_log WHERE opd_concept_id=5704 ) AS ql WHERE CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(ql.created_on)) NOT IN ( SELECT CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(date_enrolled))X FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=1 ) AND patient_id IN ( SELECT patient_id FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=1 AND (DATE(date_completed) IS NULL OR DATE(date_completed) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) ) GROUP BY patient_id, DATE(created_on) ) AS fqlog
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=2 AND DATE(date_enrolled) between :startOfPeriod and :endOfPeriod

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT patient_id, DATE(created_on) AS qa FROM ( SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM triage_patient_queue_log WHERE triage_concept_id=5123
UNION ALL
SELECT patient_id, created_on FROM opd_patient_queue_log WHERE opd_concept_id=5704 ) AS ql WHERE CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(ql.created_on)) NOT IN ( SELECT CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(date_enrolled))X FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=2 ) AND patient_id IN ( SELECT patient_id FROM patient_program WHERE program_id=2 AND (DATE(date_completed) IS NULL OR DATE(date_completed) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod ) ) GROUP BY patient_id, DATE(created_on) ) AS fqlog

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT MIN(DATE(obs_datetime)) fp_regdate FROM obs o WHERE concept_id IN (374,100126267) GROUP BY person_id ORDER BY obs_datetime ASC ) AS fp WHERE fp_regdate BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT person_id, DATE(obs_datetime) obs_date FROM obs o WHERE concept_id = 374 AND CONCAT(DATE(obs_datetime),'-',person_id) NOT IN ( SELECT CONCAT(MIN(DATE(obs_datetime)),'-',person_id) fp_regdate FROM obs o WHERE concept_id IN (374,100126267) GROUP BY person_id ORDER BY obs_datetime ASC ) GROUP BY person_id, DATE(obs_datetime) ) AS z1 WHERE obs_date BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT SUM(0) FROM obs WHERE DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT SUM(0) FROM obs WHERE DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs o INNER JOIN concept_answer ca ON ca.answer_concept = o.concept_id AND ca.concept_id=4197 WHERE DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs o WHERE o.concept_id IN (3460,3140,4618) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs o INNER JOIN concept_answer ca ON ca.answer_concept = o.concept_id AND ca.concept_id=5321 WHERE DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs o WHERE o.concept_id IN (2848,1605,5323,4206,3485,3501,5283,3434,3520,3241,3291) AND DATE(o.obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs o WHERE o.concept_id IN (2657,3152,3186,3160,4688) AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM opd_drug_order odo INNER JOIN inventory_drug d ON d.id=odo.inventory_drug_id AND d.category_id=4 WHERE DATE(odo.created_on) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs WHERE concept_id=100126134 AND value_coded=1562 AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs WHERE concept_id=100126134 AND value_coded=1516 AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM obs WHERE concept_id=100126134 AND value_coded=1170 AND DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
SELECT SUM(0) FROM obs WHERE DATE(obs_datetime) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(created_date)) FROM ( SELECT patient_id, created_date, waiver_amount FROM billing_patient_service_bill UNION ALL SELECT patient_id, created_date, waiver_amount FROM indoor_patient_service_bill UNION ALL SELECT patient_id, created_on, waiver_amount FROM inventory_store_drug_patient ) AS paylogs WHERE waiver_amount IS NOT NULL AND waiver_amount <> 0 AND DATE(created_date) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod GROUP BY CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(created_date)) ) AS finalWaives

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(waiver_amount),0) FROM ( SELECT waiver_amount, created_date FROM billing_patient_service_bill UNION ALL SELECT waiver_amount, created_date FROM indoor_patient_service_bill UNION ALL SELECT waiver_amount, created_on FROM inventory_store_drug_patient ) AS paylogs WHERE waiver_amount IS NOT NULL AND DATE(created_date) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(created_date)) FROM billing_patient_service_bill WHERE free_bill <> 0 AND free_bill IS NOT NULL AND DATE(created_date) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod GROUP BY CONCAT(patient_id,'-',DATE(created_date)) ) AS paylogs
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(free_bill),0) FROM billing_patient_service_bill WHERE free_bill IS NOT NULL AND free_bill <> 0 AND DATE(created_date) BETWEEN :startOfPeriod AND :endOfPeriod
